articles.description: As Arsenal prepare to host Tottenham in the Premier League, BBC Sport looks at why frustration is beginning to grow at the club.
articles.title: Arsenal vs Tottenham: Why is frustration growing at Mikel Arteta's Gunners?

articles.description: BBC Sport columnist Guillem Balague and football news reporter Simon Stone answer questions around Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: A clearer picture of Man City boss, his family life & the media

articles.description: Novak Djokovic surpasses Roger Federer's all-time record for the most major singles matches played as he reaches the Australian Open third round.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Novak Djokovic breaks Roger Federer record with win over Jaime Faria

articles.description: Kelly Cates, Mark Chapman and Gabby Logan will be the new Match of the Day presenters, the BBC has announced.
articles.title: Match of the Day presenters: Kelly Cates, Mark Chapman and Gabby Logan to host MOTD

articles.description: Britain's Jodie Burrage gives a good account of herself but is beaten in straight sets by Coco Gauff in the Australian Open second round.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Jodie Burrage loses to Coco Gauff in Melbourne second round

articles.description: Saracens' New Zealand-born stand-off Fergus Burke is named in Scotland's squad for the 2025 Six Nations.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Scotland squad includes Fergus Burke & Jack Mann

articles.description: Two-time Australian Open champion Naomi Osaka says she took out a "little revenge" after coming back to beat Czech 20th seed Karolina Muchova.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Naomi Osaka takes 'little revenge' to reach third round

articles.description: South Africa fast bowler Anrich Nortje will not play in the ICC Champions Trophy because of a back injury.
articles.title: South Africa fast bowler Anrich Nortje ruled out of Champions Trophy with back injury

articles.description: Uncapped Leinster prop Jack Boyle is included in Ireland's Six Nations squad, replacing the suspended Tom O'Toole.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Uncapped Leinster prop Jack Boyle named in Ireland's squad

articles.description: Nottingham Forest's heroics were only undone by a genius double substitution by Liverpool boss Arne Slot, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest 1-1 Liverpool: Hosts' heroics undone by Slot's super sub on night of pure theatre
